translation: Aʿlani brat (qṭʿii tʿlq) chuh Allah tʿālyā sndi ṭrfh th tmụ̄ sndis rsvl (ṣly Allah ʿlyh vslmn) hndi ṭrfh timn mushrkn yimn sintụ̄ tohyih mʿāhdh ạsiv krimtụ̄. (yim āyat ạsụ̄ rkvʿ 5 kis ākhrs tam 9h mnz tmhi vqth nạzil spdymtụ̄ yylhi nby ṣly Allah ʿlyh v slmv ḥẓrt abvbkr ṣdyq rẓy Allah tʿālyā ʿnh ḥj khạṭr rvanh ạsụ̄ krimtụ̄. Timn pth yylhi yim āyat nạzil spdụ̄, ḥẓvr chih ḥẓrt ʿly rẓy Allah tʿālyā ʿnh has svzan takh ḥajn hndis ʿām mjms mnz bvznavn yim, th pth krn yimn czon ktahn hund aʿlan: (1) tiyuth kanhh shkhṣ aaczi nh jnts yus dyni aslam qbvl krnh nishhi ankar kri (2) yymhi vriyih pth gczihh nh kanhh mushrk ḥj khạṭr yun (3) bytu Allah hs andụ̄ andụ̄ nnge ṭvaf krun chuh mmnvʿ (4) yimn lukn sintụ̄ rsvl Allah ṣly Allah ʿlyh v slmn hund mʿāhdh baqy chuh, yʿny yim ʿhd puhttravnkụ̄ murtkb chihnh gmtụ̄, timn sintụ̄ yyih mʿāhdh kis vqts tam vfa krnh. Ḥẓvr ṣly Allah ʿlyh v slmn hndi amhi hdayth mṭạbq chih ḥẓrt ʿly rẓy Allah tʿālyā ʿnh 10 dhy alḥjh yih aʿlan kran. Rvud vonụ̄ mʿāhdn hund tʿlq. Svrh anfal āyt nmbr 58 has mnz āv pth kun frmavnh zi yylhi tohyih kunhi qvmh ṭrfh khyant (ʿhd shkny th ghdạry) hund andyshh āshi, tylhi chhkiv ʿly alaʿlan tmụ̄ sund muʿāhdh ts kun th suh kriyvun khbrdar zi vonụ̄ chuhnh chvn th svn kanhh mʿāhdh baqy. Aamy akhlaq kh ẓạbṭh mṭạbq āv mʿāhdn hnzi mnsvkhy hund yih ʿām aʿlan timn qbyln khlaf krnh yim ʿhd v pyman bavjvd ạsụ̄ hmyshh aslams khlaf sạzshhi kran rvzan, th yylhi timn mvqʿ avs yivan tmhi saʿth ạsụ̄ ʿhduk pas balae ṭaq thạvith dshmny pytth khrra spdan. Amhi aʿlan pth rvud nh ʿrbh kyn mushrikn amhi vrạe kanhh charh zi ya gczhn tim lrrns pytth tyar spdnụ̄ th aslạmy ṭaqts sintụ̄ ttkrạvith gczhn ṣfḥh hsty pytthh mittnụ̄, ya gczhn mlk trạvith nyrnụ̄ nath gczhn aslam qbvl krith pnun pan th pnun ʿlaqh tth nẓm v ẓbṭs pushravnụ̄, yymụ̄ mlkuk varyah ḥṣh chuh godde aslạmy ḥkvmts tabʿ bnvvmut)
Lhādha pihyriv thvuriv tvhụ̄ lukh byyhi czon rytn mlks mnz th zạnith thạviv zi tvhụ̄ chihv nh khudays ʿạjz krn vạlụ̄ kynhh, byyhi yih zi Allah tʿālyā chuh timn rusva krn vvl yim ḥqs ankar chih kran.

Aṭlaʿii ʿām chuh Allah tʿālyā th tmụ̄ sndis rsvl (ṣly Allah ʿlyh v slmn) hndi ṭrfh ḥji akbr kh doh tmam lukn khạṭr zi Allah tʿālyā chuh mushrkv nishhi bary aldhmh th tmụ̄ sund rsvl th (ḥji akbruk lfẓ chuh ḥj aṣghr kis mqabls mnz. Ahli ʿrb ạsụ̄ ʿmrh has loktt ḥj vnan. Ath mqablh yus ḥj dhy alḥjh kyn mqrr tạrykhn mnz spdan chuh, tth chih ḥji akbr vnan) vonụ̄ agr tvhụ̄ lukh tvbh kriv, tylhi chuh tuhndy khạṭr bhtr, th agr buth chihv pihran tylhi zạniv tthyk pạtthụ̄ zi tvhụ̄ chihv nh Allah tʿālyā ʿạjz krn vạlụ̄ th ae nby, ankar krn vạlụ̄ bvznạviyvukh skht ʿdhabch khosh khbr.

Timav mshrkv vrạe yimn sintụ̄ tohyih mʿāhdh kriv pth kr nh timv pnun ʿhd pvur krns mnz tohyih sintụ̄ kanhh kmy th nh kvrukh tohyih khlaf kạnshi mdd, tylhi kriv tvhụ̄ thi yithyn lukn sintụ̄ mʿāhdh kis vqts tam vfa tikyazi Allah tʿālyā chuh mtqy lukne psnd kran.

Lhādha yylhi ḥram ryth nyrn (yth jayih chuh ḥram rytav nishhi murad tim czvr ryth yimn hnz mhlt mushrikn ạs dinh āmcz. Chvnkh ath mhlt kis vqts mnz avsnh muslmann khạṭr jạyz zi mushrkn pytth krhn ḥmlh, amhi mvjvb chuh yimn rytn ḥram ryth vannh āmut) tylhi kriyvukh mushrk qtl yythi lbiyvukh tathi, th tim rttyvukh th ghyrav kriyvukh. Th prth zags pytth bihiv timn khbr hynh khạṭr pth agr tim tvbh krn byyhi krn nmaz qạym th zkvāh din tylhi trạvyvukh ylh (yʿny mḥẓ gczihh nh kfr v shrk nishhi tvbh krns pytth mʿāmlh khtm, blkh āshi timn nmaz qạyim krnụ̄ byyhi zkvāh dinụ̄, nath yiyhi nh yih mannh zi kufr trạvith chuh timv aslam qbvl kvrmut) Allah tʿālyā chuh drguzr krn vvl th rḥm frmavn vvl.

Th agr mushrikv mnz kanhh shkhṣ pnah mngith tohyih nishhi yun yyczihh (takh Allah tʿālyā sund klam bvzi) tylhi diyiv ts (pnah yvt tam suh Allah tʿālyā sund klam bvzi, pth vatnạviyvun suh tmụ̄ sndis (pnah gahs) tam, yih gczihh amhi mvjvb krun zi yim lukh chihnh ʿlm thavan.

Yimn mshrikn khạṭr kithh pạtthụ̄ hykhi ạkhr Allah tʿālyā hs th tmụ̄ sndis rsvls nzdyk kanhh ʿhd (vʿdh) ạsith? Masivae timn lukn yimn sintụ̄ msjdi ḥrams nishhi mʿāhdh avsuv kvrmut, (yʿny bny knanh th bny khuzaʿh bny ẓmrh) tylhi yvt tam tim tohyih sintụ̄ siyvd rvzn, tvhụ̄ thi rvuziv timn sintụ̄ syvd, tikyazi Allah tʿālyā chuh mtqy yn psnd kran.

Mgr yimv vrạe kithh pạtthụ̄ hykhi baqy mshrkn sintụ̄ kanhh ʿhd ạsith yylhi zn tihund ḥal chuh yih zi agr tohyih pytth ghạlb yin, tylhi nah krn tuhndis mʿāmls mnz kunhi qrabtuk lḥaẓh th krn kunhi mʿāhdh chih dhmh dạry hund? Tim chih pnnyv zbanv sintụ̄ tohyih rạẓụ̄ krnch kvushsh kran, mgr dl chihkh ankar kran, th timn mnz chih akthr fasq.
Timv kvr Allah tʿālyā sndyv āyatav bdlh mʿmvly qinmt qbvl, pth spdụ̄ Allah tʿālyā snzi vathi mnz tthvr bnith khrra, sytthah bur krtvut ạsụ̄ tim, yim tim kran rvudụ̄.
Kạnshi mvmn sndis bars mnz nah chih yim qrabtuk lḥaẓh kran th nh chih kunhi ʿhd chih dhmh dạry hund th zyadty chhe hmyshh yihndy ṭrfh spzmcz.

Lhādha, agr yim tvbh krn th nmaz krn qạym th zkvāh din, tylhi chih tuhndụ̄ dyny bạe. (yʿny nmaz th zkvāh vrạe mḥẓ tvbh krnh sintụ̄ bnan nh tim tuhndụ̄ dyny bạe. Albth agr tim yih shrṭ pvur krn tylhi āshi nh aamiyuk ntyjh ṣrf yohe zi tuhndi khạṭr spdi timn pytth aathh tulun th tihndis jan v mals aathh lagun ḥram, blkh āshi mzyd ath yih fạydh zi aslạmy mʿāshrs mnz gczhn timn brabrkụ̄ ḥqvq ḥạṣl. Tim āsn mʿāshrty, tmdny th qanvny ḥythyth tmam dvyimyn muslmann hndụ̄ pạtthụ̄. Kanhh frq th amtyaz hykhi nh tihnzi vathi mnz tthvr bnith) th zann valyn khạṭr chih asụ̄ pnnụ̄ aḥkam vaẓḥ kran.

Th agr ʿhd krnh pth yim byyhi pnnụ̄ qasm puhttravn th tuhndis dyns pytth krn ḥmlh krnụ̄ shrvʿ tylhi kriv kufr kyn ʿaalm brdarn sintụ̄ jng tikyazi tihndyn qasmn hund chuhnh kanhh aʿtbar, shayd zi (pth yin tlvar hndi zvrae) tim baz. (yth jayih chuh ʿhd krnuk th qasm khynh nishhi murad muslman spdnuk ʿhd krun th aslam chih vfadạry hndụ̄ qasm khynụ̄. Mṭlb chuh yih zi agr yim muslman spdanh pth byyhi kfrs kun phyirụ̄, tylhi gczihh yimn sintụ̄ jng yun krnh. Aamy ḥukmh mṭạbq avs ḥẓrt abvbkri ṣdyq rẓy Allah tʿālyā ʿnh han murtdn khlaf jng kvrmut.)

Kya tvhụ̄ lrriv na tithyn lukn sintụ̄ yim pnnụ̄ ʿhd chih rvudimtụ̄ phuttravan, th yimv rsvl mlkh mnz krrnuk qṣd avs kvrmut th zyadty hund abtda krn vạlụ̄ ạsụ̄ time? Kya tvhụ̄ chihvh yimn khoczan? Agr tvhụ̄ mvmn chihv tylhi chuh Allah tʿālyā aamiyuk zyadh ḥqdar zi tas khvcziv.
Yimn sintụ̄ lrriv, Allah tʿālyā diyavnavi tuhndyv aathv sintụ̄ yimn sza, th yimn kri dhlyl v khvar th yihndis mqabls mnz kryv tohyih mdd, th varyahn mvmnn hndyn diln pavi shyhjar.

Th tihndyn diln hund phuhun (czkh) mittavi byyhi ys yyczihh ts diyih tvbuk tvfyq thi. (muslmann avs khvf zi yih aʿlan spdạnụ̄ lghi ʿrbh kis andụ̄ pkis nar th aashi yiyhi akis bdds khvn ryz jngs sintụ̄ sạbqh pysh, khudayn diyut yimn āyatn mnz aṭmynan zi tuhund yih andyshh chuh ghlṭ, ntyjh āshi ath brʿks) Allah tʿālyā chuh svrue zann vvl th dana.

Kya tohyih lukv chuhvh yih smjhmut zi yithae yiyiv ylh travnh, ḥalankh khudayn vuchuhe nh vunhi yih zi tohyih mnz km lukh chih tim yimv (tmụ̄ snzi vathi andr) jan fishạny kr th byyhi bnvvukh nh khudays th rsvl ṣly Allah ʿlyh v slms th mvminv vrạe byyhi kanhh jgry dvst, yikynczhah tvhụ̄ kran chihv Allah tʿālyā chuh tmhi nishhi bakhbr.

Mushrikn hnz chahnh yih kạm zi tim bnn Allah tʿālyā snzn msjdn hndụ̄ mujạvr th khạdm ḥalankh tim chih khod pans pytth kufrch shhadt divan, tihndụ̄ sạry aʿmal spdụ̄ ẓaʿʿ th timn chuh hmyshh jhnms mnz rvzun.

Allah tʿālyā snzn msjdn hndụ̄ ābad kar (mujavr th khạdm) hykn time lukh ạsith yim khudays th ạkhrt kis dohs mann, th nmaz krn qạym, zkvāh din, byyhi khoczn nh khudays vrạe kạnshi, yimne nishhi chuh yih tvqʿ zi yim pkn syzi vathi.

Kya tohyih lukv chhvh ḥajn trysh chavns th msjdi ḥramch mjạvry krns tas shkhṣh snzi kamhi brabr zạnụ̄mcz, yymụ̄ ayman avn khudays pytth th ạkhrt kis dohs pytth th yymụ̄ jan fishạny kr Allah tʿālyā snzi vathi mnz (amhi arshad sintụ̄ chuh yih fạṣlh krnh āmut zi bytu Allah hch tvlyt hykhi nh vonụ̄ mushrkn nishhi rvuzith. Mshrkyni qrysh hykn nh ṣrf athụ̄ bnyads pytth aamikụ̄ ḥqdar ạsith zi tim chih ḥajn rvudimtụ̄ khdmt kran) khudays nzdyk chihnh yim doshve brabr kynhh, thi Allah tʿālyā chuhnh ẓạlmn rhnmạyy kran.
Yimv ayman avn th yimv tmụ̄ snzi vathi mnz gr bar trạvụ̄, byyhi kvrukh jan v mal sintụ̄ jhad, khudays nzdyk chuh timne lukn hund drjh bvdd, th timae chih kamyab.
Tihund rb chuh timn pnnhi rḥmtch th pnnhi khoshnvdy hnz byyhi tithyn jntn hnz bshart divan, yythi tihndi khạṭr paʿdar ʿạshikụ̄ samanh āsn.
Tim rvzn yimn mnz hmyshh, pzpạtthụ̄ chuh khudays nishhi khdmatn hund bdlh dinh khạṭr varyah kynhh.
Ae lvukv yimv ayman chuhv avnmut, pnnụ̄ mạlụ̄ th pnnụ̄ bạe thi mah bnạviyvkh pnnụ̄ rfyq, agr tim kufrs din aymans pytth trjyḥ tohyih mnz yim timn rfyq bnavn time āsn ẓạlm.

Ae nby, vniv zi agr tuhndụ̄ mạlụ̄, th tuhndụ̄ frznd, th tuhndụ̄ bạe, th tuhnz khandarinhi th tuhndụ̄ aang ạshnav, th tuhndụ̄ tim mal yim tohyih kmạvimtụ̄ chihv, th tuhndụ̄ tim karbar, yihndi khsaruk tohyih khvf chuhv, th tuhndụ̄ tim gr yim tohyih psnd chihv, chihv tohyih Allah tʿālyā th tmụ̄ sndis rsvl th tmụ̄ snzi vathi mnz jhad khoth zyadh ttạtthụ̄, tylhi kriv antẓar yvt tam Allah tʿālyā pnun fạṣlh tohyih brvnhh kun aanhi th Allah tʿālyā chuhnh fasq lukn rhnmạyy kran.

Khudayn chuh yymhi brvnhh varyahn mvqʿn pytth tohyih mdd kvrmut, kynhh kal brvnhh ghzvh ḥunyn kh doh (tmụ̄ snzi dstgyry hnz shan chahv tohyih vuchhmcz). (ghzvh ḥunyn avs shval 8h mnz yim āyat nạzil gczhnh brvnhh ṣrf bah turvah ryth mks th ṭạyfs mnzbag ḥunyn chih vady mnz pysh āmut. Aath ghzvs mnz avs mslmann hndi ṭrfh ṣrf 12 sas fvj th dvyimhi ṭrfh ạsụ̄ kufar yihndi khoth varyah km. Mgr amhi bavjvd chih hvazn qbylkụ̄ tyr andaz mslmann pth czalnh mokhh mjbvr kran th aislamuk lshkr chuh bur pạtthụ̄ chhlh chhangri gczihth titr bitr spdan. Tmhi vqth ạsụ̄ ṣrf nby byyhi km kynczhah jan baz ṣḥabh yihndụ̄ qdm pnnhi jayih ddlụ̄ nh th tihnzy thạbt qdmy hund ntyjh avs zi navi sr hyvk fvjuk trtyb qạym spdith th ạkhr kar spz muslmann ftḥ nṣyb. Nath yikynczhah ftḥi mkh nishhi ḥạṣl avs spudmut tmhi khoth czvr byyhi he ḥunyns mnz ravrun) tmhi doh auvsuv tohyih pnnhi tʿdad kh kthrtuk ghrvr. Mgr suh lvguv nh tohyih kunhi bkar th zmyn gyih pnnhi vusʿt bavjvd tohyih pytth tng th tvhụ̄ czliv shanh pihrith.

Khudayn kr pth pnnụ̄ skynt pnnis rsvl (ṣly Allah ʿlyh v slms) pytth th mvmnn pytth nạzil th tim lshkr vạlin, yim tohyih aathhi ạsiv nh yivan, byyhi diytun mnkryni ḥqn sza. Th yohe bdlh chuh timn lukn yim ḥqs chih ankar kran.

Pth (vuchihv tohyih yithi zi) yithh pạtthụ̄ sza dinh pth yas Allah tʿālyā yczhan chuh tas chuh tvbuk tvfyq bkhshan. (asharh chuh ath kathhi kun zi ghzvh ḥunynas mnz yimv kufarav shikst khyvv tim sạry spdụ̄ pth muslman.) Allah tʿālyā chuh drguzr krn vvl th rḥm frmavn vvl.

Ae lvukv yimv ayman chuhv avnmut, mushrkyn chih napak, lhādha gczhn nh yim yymhi vriyih pth msjdi ḥrams nkhh yinụ̄ (yʿny āʿndh vryih chuhnh yimn khạṭr ḥj th yihnz zyarte yạcz bnd blkh chuh msjdi ḥram kyn ḥdvudn mnz yuhund dakhlh thi bnd) th agr tohyih tng dsty hund khvf chuh, tylhi chahnh yih kth dvur zi agr Allah tʿālyā yyczihh tohyih kryv pnnhi fẓlh sintụ̄ ghny, Allah tʿālyā chuh zann vvl th ḥkmt vvl.

Jng kriv (ahli ktabv mnz) timn lukn khlaf yim khudays th ạkhrt kis dohs pytth ayman chihnh aanan th yikynczhah khudayn th tmụ̄ sndụ̄ rsvl ṣly Allah ʿlyh v slmn ḥram chuh qrar diytmut tth chihnh ḥram kran, byyhi chihnh dyni ḥq pnun dyn bnavan yim ahl ktab (timn sintụ̄ lrriv) tvt tam zi tim din pnnhi aathh jizyih byyhi rvzn lokttụ̄ bnith. (yʿny lrrayih hund ghayt chuhnh yih zi tim anin ayman th dyni ḥqkụ̄ bnn pyrvkar. Blkh chuh aamiyuk ghayt yih zi tihnz ḥkmrany gczihh khtm gczhnụ̄, tim gczhn nh zmyns pytth ḥạkm th ṣaḥbi aamr bnith rvznụ̄ blkh gczhn zmyn kh nẓami zndgy hnz lakmh, byyhi frman rvạyy th amantkụ̄ akhtyarat dyni ḥq kyn pyrvkarn hndyn athn mnz rvznụ̄ th ahli ktab gczhn yimn matḥt tạbʿ th mṭyʿ bnith rvznụ̄. Amhi pth yymhi sund dil yimav mnz yyczihh, suh spdin pnnhi mrẓy mslman, nath rvuzin jizyih divan. Jizyih chuh bdl tmhi amanuk th ḥfaẓtuk, yus dhimiyan aslamy ḥkvmts mnz ʿṭa chuh yivan krnh. Byyhi chhe yih ʿlamt tmhi ḥukmch zi yim lukh chih tabʿ amr bnns pytth rạẓy)

Yhvudụ̄ chih vnan zi ʿuuzyr chuh Allah tʿālyā sund frzndh, th ʿīsạe chih vnan zi msyḥ chuh Allah tʿālyā sund frznd, yimh chhe be ḥqyqt kthh, yimh tim pnnyv zbanv mnz chih krran. Timn lukn kun vuchihth yim yimn brvnhh kfrs mnz mbtla ạsụ̄ spdụ̄mtụ̄. Allah tʿālyā sund mar yimn pytth, yim kpạrụ̄ chih dvkhh khyvan.

Timv chih pnnụ̄ ʿạlm thi drvysh khudays vrạe pnnụ̄ rb bnạvimtụ̄. (ḥdyth shryfs mnz chuh āmut zi ḥẓrt ʿdy bn ḥatm rẓy Allah tʿālyā ʿnh yim goddh ʿīsạe ạsụ̄, yylhi nby ṣly Allah ʿlyh v slmn nishhi ḥạẓr spdith mushrf bh aslam spdụ̄, timv kvr ḥẓvr ṣly Allah ʿlyh v slms sval zi yth āyts mnz yus aashi pytth pnnụ̄ ʿạlm th drvysh khudae bnavnuk alzam ʿạyd krnh chuh āmut, aamich aṣlyt kya chhe? Drjvab chih ḥẓvr frmavan kya yih chuhna pazr zi yikynczhah yim lukh ḥram chih qrar divan suh chuhv tvhụ̄ ḥram manan th yikynczhah yim ḥlal chih qrar divan suh chihv ḥlal manan? Timv kvr ʿrẓ balkl chih asụ̄ yy kran. Frmvvukh bas yohe gvv yim rb bnavnụ̄. Amhi nishhi spud mʿlvm zi Allah tʿālyā snzi ktabhi hndi sanad vrạe yim lukh ansạny zndgy khạṭr jạyz th najạyzkụ̄ ḥdvud chih mqrr kran, tim chih draṣl khudayy hndis mqams pytth pnnhi ghrvr sintụ̄ khsith jae rttan th yim yihndis aath shryʿt sạzy hndis ḥqs chih tslym kran tim chih yimn khudae bnavan) th yithe pạtthụ̄ ʿīsyā abn mrym ʿlyh alslamn thi (rb manan) ḥalankh yimn avs nh akis mʿbvds vrạe byyhi kạnshi hnz ʿbadt krnuk ḥkm dinh āmut, suh yas vrạe kanhh chuhnh ʿbadtuk ḥqdar, suh chuh pak timav mshrkanh katahv nishhi, yimh yim lukh kran chih.
Yim lukh chih yczhan Allah tʿālyā sund gash krhn pnnyv phokav sintụ̄ czhyth, mgr Allah tʿālyā chuhnh pnun gash mkml krnh vrạe mann vvl kynhh, khvah kạfrn gczhụ̄ tn yih kvtah thi nagvar.

Suh chuh Allah tʿālyā he yymụ̄ pnun rsvl hdayt th dyni ḥq hyth svuzmut chuh, takh aath kri tmam jnsi dynas pytth ghạlb, (aldyn lfẓuk trjmh chuh aashi jinsi dyn kvrmut. Lfẓ dyn chuh ʿrby zbạnụ̄ mnz tmhi nẓami zndgy ya ṭryqi zndgy khạṭr astʿmal spdan yymhi kis qạym krn vạlis sanad th muṭaʿ tslym krith tmụ̄ snz aitbaʿ yiyhi krnh. Ae nby, agr fạydh shlu alḥṣvl (shl ḥạṣl krun) āshe th sfr lvt āsihe tylhi gczhhan tim ẓrvur tohyih pth pth nyrnh khạṭr āmadh mgr timn pytth gyih yih vath sytthah kiryitth (yʿny yih vuchihth zi mqablh chuh rvum hivis ṭaqts sintụ̄ th vqt chuh shdyd grmy hund th mlks chhe qḥṭ sạlụ̄, th navi vriyikụ̄ fṣl, yim lonns vạtimtụ̄ ạsụ̄, timn lvg tbvukuk sfr sytthah gvb basinh) vonụ̄ vnan tim Allah tʿālyā sund qasm khyvan khyvan zi agr asụ̄ nyrith hykh hav, asụ̄ nyrhav pzpạtthụ̄ tohyih sintụ̄, tim chih pnun pan hlakts mnz travan, Allah tʿālyā chuh varh pạtthụ̄ zanan zi tim chih aapziyạrụ̄.

Agr pzpạtthụ̄ tihund aradh nyrnuk āshi he tylh krhn tim amhi khạṭr kynhh tyạry mgr khudays avsnh tihund vothn psnde amhi mvjvb krụ̄ tmụ̄ tim ālczụ̄ th vannh ākh zi rvuziv bihith, byhh valn sintụ̄.

(yythi pytthh chih tim āyat shrvʿ spdan yim ghzvh tbvk pth chih nạzil spdụ̄mtụ̄) ae nby, kufarn th mnafqn doshvnụ̄ sintụ̄ kriv pvur ṭaqth san mqablh th yimn sintụ̄ yiyiv skhty san pysh, ạkhrkar chuh yuhund tthkanh jhnm th so chhe bdtryn rvzn jae.

Vonụ̄ agr yim pnnhi rvishhi nishhi baz yin, tylhi chuh yih yihndụ̄ khạṭr bhtr, th agr yim baz phyrụ̄ nh tylhi diyih Allah tʿālyā yimn sytthah dg tulvun sza, dunya hs mnz thi th ạkhrts mnz thi, th zmyns mnz chuhnh kanhh yus yimn ḥmayty th mddgar āshi.

(suh chuh var pạtthụ̄ zanan timn knjvs dvlt mndn) yim barẓaa v rghbt dinh valyn ahli aymann hnzn mạlụ̄ qrbạnyn pytth kathh chih kran (yʿny timn chih ʿīb lad vnan) th timn lukn chih ttsnh czttan yimn nishhi (Allah tʿālyā snzi vathi mnz dinh khạṭr) aamhi vrạe kihinụ̄ chuhnh yikynczhah tim pans pytth mshqt brdasht krith divan chih. Ae nby, khvah tvhụ̄ krụ̄tav yithyn lukn hndi khạṭr mʿāfy hund drkhvast ya mth kritv, agr tvhụ̄ satthhi ltthi thi yimn mʿāf krnuk drkhvast kriv, Allah tʿālyā kri nh yimn hrgz mʿāf amhi mvjvub zi yimav chuh khudays th tmụ̄ sndis rsvl ṣly Allah ʿlyh v slms sintụ̄ kufr kvrmut, th Allah tʿālyā chuhnh fasq lukn njatch vath havan.

Yimn lukn pth rvznuk ajazt avs dinh āmut tim spdụ̄ khudae sndis rsvl ṣly Allah ʿlyh v slms sath nah dinas th gr rvzns pytth khosh th timn gvv nh gvarh zi Allah tʿālyā snzi vathi mnz krhn jan v mal sintụ̄ jhad. Timv vvn lukn zi, yth skht grmy mnz mah nyiriv. Yimn vniv zi jhnmuk nar chuh amhi khoth zyadh grm, kash yimn āshi he aamiyuk shʿūr.

Agr Allah tʿālyā tohyih yimn drmyan vaps niyav th āʿndh mngyv yimv mnz kanhh dvr jhads nyrnh khạṭr ajazt tylhi vnụ̄ ziyvkh ṣaf, vonụ̄ hykiv nh hrgz tvhụ̄ me sintụ̄ nyirith th nh hykiv me sintụ̄ rlith kạnshi dshmns sintụ̄ lrrith, tohyih avsuv brvnhh bihith rvzun psnd kvrmut. Th āʿndh yus yimv mnz mari, tmụ̄ sund nmazi jnazh thi prụ̄ ziyv nh tvhụ̄ hrgz th nh gczhụ̄ ziyv tmụ̄ snzi qbri pytth zanhh khrra, tikyazi yimav chuh khudays th tmụ̄ sndis rsvl ṣly Allah ʿlyh v slms sintụ̄ kfr kvrmut th tim chih mvudimtụ̄ ath ḥals mnz zi tim ạsụ̄ fasq.

Tihnz maldạry th tihund kthrti avlad yinh tohyih dvkhs mnz travyv, khudayn chuh aradh kvrmut zi aamhi malh th avlad dhryʿh diyih yimn yythụ̄ dunya hs mnz sza th tihindụ̄ zuv gczhn ath ḥals mnz nyrnụ̄ zi tim āsn kạfr.

Amhi mvjvub chih dyn th amhi kyv ḥdvudav nishhi yihndi navạqf rvznkụ̄ amkan zyadh. Brvntth kun chuh 122 himis āyts mnz yihndi aamhi mrẓuk ʿlaj āmut tjvyz krnh.) Yimn bdviyan mnz chih tithụ̄ tithụ̄ lukh mvjvd yim Allah tʿālyā snzi vathi mnz chih kynhh khrch kran th ath chih pans pytth zbrdsty hnz chyttụ̄ smjhan, th tuhndis ḥqs mnz chih zmanh chn grdshn hund antẓar kran (zi tvhụ̄ gczhiv kunhi chkrs mnz phasnụ̄ th tim krrhn pnnhi grdanhi mnz aamhi nẓam kh aṭaʿtuk nalh kvr yath mnz tohyih yim khsith chhvukh thạvimtụ̄) ḥalankh bdy hund dạyrh chuh panh yimne pytth muslṭ th Allah tʿālyā chuh svrue kynhh bvzan th zanan.

Kya yimn lukn chahna khbr zi suh chuh Allah tʿālyā he yus pnnyn bndn hund tvbh chuh qbvl kran, th tihndis khyrats chuh qbvlyt ʿṭa kran, byyhi yih zi Allah tʿālyā chuh sytthah mʿāf krn vvl th rḥym.
